SEARCH

Package io.github.sahinemirhan.starter.challenge

package io.github.sahinemirhan.starter.challenge
  • Class
    Description
    BlockContext
    Context shared with BlockHandler implementations when a block decision is reached.
    BlockHandler
    Strategy interface that allows applications to customize how block decisions are enforced.
    ChallengeContext
    Context shared with ChallengeHandler implementations when a challenge decision is reached.
    ChallengeEvent
    Application event published whenever a challenge is triggered.
    ChallengeHandler
    Strategy interface that allows applications to customize how challenges are handled.
    ChallengeOutcome
    Rich outcome information that can be shared alongside a ChallengeResolution.
    ChallengeOutcome.Builder
     
    ChallengeOutcome.Status
     
    ChallengeOutcomeListener
    Callback hook that allows applications to observe produced ChallengeOutcome instances.
    ChallengePolicy
    Immutable view of the active challenge/block policy.
    ChallengePolicyStrategy
    Strategy abstraction that evaluates which ChallengePolicy should be active for a given decision.
    ChallengeResolution
    Result returned by a ChallengeHandler.
    ChallengeResolution.Type
     
    ChallengeTelemetry
    Built-in telemetry hook that logs, counts and publishes events for challenges.
    ExceptionThrowingBlockHandler
    Default BlockHandler that translates block decisions into a SpriskBlockedException.
    ExceptionThrowingChallengeHandler
    Default ChallengeHandler that records telemetry and rethrows the challenge as an exception.
    PropertiesChallengePolicyStrategy
    Default implementation backed by ChallengePolicyProperties.
